query.name: getById
query.content: select * from im_user u where id=:id

query.name: getByAccount
query.content: select * from im_user u where account=:account

query.name: getIdByAccount
query.content: select id from im_user where account=:account

query.name: queryUserList
query.content:
select u.* from im_user u where 1=1
<#if queryText?? && ''!=queryText> and ( u.account like :queryText or u.nickname like :queryText or u.number like :queryText ) </#if>
<#if age?? && ''!=age> and u.age = :age </#if>
<#if constellationCode?? && ''!=constellationCode> and u.constellationCode = :constellationCode </#if>
<#if blood?? && ''!=blood> and u.blood = :blood </#if>
<#if gender?? && ''!=gender> and u.gender = :gender </#if>
<#if type?? && ''!=type> and u.type = :type </#if>
<#if startBirthDate?? && ''!=startBirthDate> and u.birthDate >= :startBirthDate </#if>
<#if endBirthDate?? && ''!=endBirthDate> and u.birthDate <= :endBirthDate </#if>
<#if whereSQL?? && whereSQL != ''>${whereSQL}</#if> <#if orderBy?? && orderBy != ''>${orderBy}</#if>
